title: Is Suffering Always Punishment?
description:
Readings from:
Job 2:11-13; 4:1, 7-9; 5:8, 17-18, 27
Today's passages were read by Richard Clark, host of the podcast No Chill Enneagram. 
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
